name: TerraDividia - The Tale Of Minighun Svine
name_original: TerraDividia - The Tale Of Minighun Svine
description:
Hi,

This is my first completely independent project - the cornerstone of my game-dev journey.

I started working on it with minimal knowledge in programming and game development in general.

It's a product of passion and perseverance, GameDev.Tv courses I took on Udemy, Unity engine, and most importantly a bunch of close people who have supported me along the way.

In this game I tried to incorporate classic elements from old console games I grew up on.

Everything you see in this game, I did entirely by myself in my spare time.

The music in the game was given to us absolutely for free by King Gizzard And The Lizard Wizard (so check them out if you like it).

Hope you enjoy it (though it was designed to be exhausting sometimes) and please write what you think of it, so I can make this game and my next projects better.

Peace and Love,

Pavel
